name: Samurai Joe
description:
Samurai Joe is a text-input based game with action and strategic elements. Help Joe face off against enemies, traps and escape!

Game controls are restriced to the keyboard. Commands can be typed, and then validated through the Enter-key.

This game was developed for the "Search For A Star" Competition 2021. Supporting documentation regarding asset sources and development are enclosed. The compressed file file should be unzipped, after which the application can be started immediately.
